features.name: Hubspot Connector Registration
features.description: Registers the Hubspot connector in the Evoq connectors list and makes it available for configuration.
test_scenarios: Verify connector appears in the connectors list
Verify connector displays correct name and icon
Verify connector is categorized under Marketing
Verify connector does not support multiple instances
Verify connector dependency on HubspotForms module

features.name: Hubspot Forms Module Installation
features.description: Installs the Hubspot Forms module that enables form embedding on pages.
test_scenarios: Verify module installs successfully
Verify module appears in available modules list
Verify module can be added to pages
Verify module dependencies are met
Verify Azure compatibility

features.name: Hubspot Form Configuration
features.description: Configures Hubspot forms with Portal ID, Form ID, and completion actions.
features.ui_location: Page Module > Settings (gear icon) > HubSpot Forms Settings
test_scenarios: Enter valid Portal ID and Form ID
Save configuration with empty Portal ID
Save configuration with empty Form ID
Verify validation against Hubspot API
Test invalid Portal ID/Form ID combination
Verify settings persistence after save
Test settings page redirect with NoRedirectOnUpdate parameter

features.name: Form Completion Actions
features.description: Configures what happens after a form is successfully submitted.
features.ui_location: Page Module > Settings > Completion Action dropdown
test_scenarios: Select 'HubSpot's Default Action' and verify form uses Hubspot's follow-up URL
Select 'No Action' and verify form hides after submission
Select 'Redirect to URL' and configure redirect URL
Select 'Custom Message' and configure custom HTML message
Verify redirect URL field appears when 'Redirect to URL' is selected
Verify custom message field appears when 'Custom Message' is selected
Test page ID redirect (numeric value)
Test external URL redirect

features.name: Hubspot Form Display
features.description: Renders Hubspot forms on pages using JavaScript embed code.
features.ui_location: Any page where HubSpot Forms module is added
test_scenarios: Verify form renders when valid configuration exists
Verify initialization message shows when no Portal ID configured
Test form submission with default action
Test form submission with redirect action
Test form submission with custom message
Test form submission with no action
Verify JavaScript error handling
Verify form placeholder generation

features.name: Connector Status Display
features.description: Shows connector status and lists pages where Hubspot forms are deployed.
test_scenarios: Verify 'Not Connected' message when no forms exist
Verify 'Connected' message when forms exist
Verify list of pages displays correctly
Verify page links navigate to correct pages
Test clicking on page link in the list
Verify JSON serialization of form information

features.name: Form Validation
features.description: Validates Hubspot Portal ID and Form ID against Hubspot API.
test_scenarios: Test validation with correct Portal ID and Form ID
Test validation with incorrect Portal ID
Test validation with incorrect Form ID
Test validation with network timeout
Test validation error message display
Verify validation URL construction
Test RestSharp client timeout (10 seconds)

features.name: Module Localization
features.description: Provides localized text for UI elements and messages.
features.ui_location: All UI elements in the module
test_scenarios: Verify all UI labels display correct text
Verify error messages display correctly
Verify help text displays for form fields
Test resource key resolution
Verify default text fallback

features.name: Custom Message Editor
features.description: Rich text editor for creating custom submission messages.
features.ui_location: Page Module > Settings > Custom Message field
test_scenarios: Enter plain text message
Enter HTML formatted message
Test special character encoding
Test quote and apostrophe handling
Verify HTML decode functionality
Test message trimming of line breaks

features.name: Connector JavaScript Integration
features.description: Client-side functionality for connector management in Persona Bar.
test_scenarios: Verify KnockoutJS binding initialization
Test page navigation from connector view
Verify Persona Bar close functionality
Test View button text replacement
Verify computed observables for pages list
